scripts.seed:willian: curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/dev/seed-user -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"name\":\"Willian\",\"email\":\"willianinove01@gmail.com\",\"password\":\"123456\"}" || npx -y curl-cli http://localhost:3001/api/dev/seed-user -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"name\":\"Willian\",\"email\":\"willianinove01@gmail.com\",\"password\":\"123456\"}"
